<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given a call or invoke instruction to the elide safe coroutine, this function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// does the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - Allocate a frame for the callee coroutine in the caller using alloca.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - Replace the old CB with a new Call or Invoke to &#96;NewCallee&#96;, with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    pointer to the frame as an additional argument to NewCallee.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// introduction of two pesudo lifetime intrinsics in the frontend around the</span></CodeLine>
